transArray.content: The terrace double room I booked was for the terrace, but when I entered the room, I found that there was no window at all, and there was only one person outside, and the inner patio was sunny. I didnâ€™t explain the situation to the front desk. After the front desk said that the terrace rooms were being renovated, they only upgraded to a superior double room. It's a three-story room that can see the sun, and it feels like a blood loss. But the store attitude is very good Free parking
